pkgmetadata.longdescription: Companion to Applied Linear Statistical Models // Functions and Data set to Accompany Applied Linear Statistical Models Fifth Edition, Michael H. Kutner; Christopher J. Nachtsheim; John Neter; William Li, 2005. Present the function on the package that does not exist in the R. In this version of the package Chapters 1 to 9 have been investigated. In future versions more chapters to be checked.
